action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X ▢
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
▢ X X X ▢

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. Starting from the top row, there is an empty square, followed by three filled squares, and ending with an empty square. The second row begins with a filled square, an empty square, a filled square, another empty square, and ends with a filled square. The third row has filled squares in all positions except for the third one, which is empty. The fourth row mirrors the second row with a filled square, an empty square, a filled square, an empty square, and a filled square. The fifth and final row mirrors the first row with an empty square, three filled squares, and an empty square at the end.
continue
